name: CHHapticPatternPlayer
desc: A protocol that defines a standard pattern player capable of playing haptic patterns with fixed parameters.

items.name: func start(atTime: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Starts playing the pattern at the specified time.

items.name: func stop(atTime: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Stops playing the pattern at the specified time.

items.name: func cancel()
items.desc: Stops the pattern player immediately and returns the specified error.

items.name: func sendParameters([CHHapticDynamicParameter], atTime: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Sends an array of haptic parameters, starting at the specified time.

items.name: func scheduleParameterCurve(CHHapticParameterCurve, atTime: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Schedules a parameter curve to begin transitioning a parameter at a certain time.

items.name: var isMuted: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that silences all haptic and audio output from the player when set to true.
